title: 105_s991
content: The table of contents in section 1 of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended by changing references to Boston National Historic Park Act and Women's Rights National Historic Park to Boston National Historical Park Act and Women's Rights National Historical Park. Additionally, section 2 discusses The Presidio of San Francisco. SEC. 2. THE PRESIDIO OF SAN FRANCISCO is amended in various sections of the Omnibus Parks Act to correct wording. SEC. 3. COLONIAL NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK is updated with a new map dated August 1996. SEC. 4. BIG THICKET NATIONAL PRESERVE has amendments regarding an exchange deadline. SEC. 5. LAMPREY WILD AND SCENIC RIVER. SEC. 5. LAMPREY WILD AND SCENIC RIVER is amended to change "cooperation agreements" to "cooperative agreements". SEC. 6. VANCOUVER NATIONAL HISTORIC RESERVE is updated by removing redundant text. SEC. 7. AMENDMENT TO BOSTON NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK ACT corrects a typo in the title. SEC. 8. MEMORIAL TO MARTIN LUTHER KING, JR. is amended. SEC. 9. ADVISORY COUNCIL ON HISTORIC PRESERVATION REAUTHORIZATION is updated. SEC. 10. GREAT FALLS HISTORIC DISTRICT, NEW JERSEY is amended. SEC. 11. NEW BEDFORD NATIONAL HISTORIC LANDMARK DISTRICT is mentioned. Section 511 of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended to update the New Bedford Historic District and the General Management Plan. The Omnibus Parks Act is amended to update the New Bedford Historic District and General Management Plan, including changes to authorization of appropriations and cooperative grants. SEC. 12. NICODEMUS NATIONAL HISTORIC SITE and SEC. 13. UNALASKA are amended to correct typographical errors. SEC. 14. REVOLUTIONARY WAR AND WAR OF 1812 HISTORIC PRESERVATION STUDY is updated to remove specific language regarding the study. SEC. 15. SHENANDOAH VALLEY BATTLEFIELDS is mentioned. SEC. 15. SHENANDOAH VALLEY BATTLEFIELDS is amended to change references to subsections. SEC. 16. WASHITA BATTLEFIELD is mentioned. SEC. 16. WASHITA BATTLEFIELD is amended to work with local landowners. SEC. 17. SKI AREA PERMIT RENTAL CHARGE is updated to include "AGR" in subsections and change terminology to "subpermittees." SEC. 18. ROBERT J. LAGOMARSINO VISITOR CENTER is mentioned. SEC. 18. ROBERT J. LAGOMARSINO VISITOR CENTER is amended by changing a reference in the Omnibus Parks Act. SEC. 19. NATIONAL PARK SERVICE ADMINISTRATIVE REFORM. Section 814(a) of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended to correct various typographical errors and inconsistencies in leasing procedures. Section 7(c)(2) of the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 is amended to correct language regarding the total appraised value of lands, waters, and interests therein. Additionally, Section 814(d)(2)(E) of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended to address leasing procedures. Section 814(g)(1)(A) of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended to clarify definitions, while Section 7(c)(2) of the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act is updated regarding appraised values and leasing procedures. SEC. 20. BLACKSTONE RIVER VALLEY NATIONAL HERITAGE CORRIDOR is amended for fiscal years 1998, 1999, and 2000. SEC. 21. TALLGRASS PRAIRIE NATIONAL PRESERVE. SEC. 21. TALLGRASS PRAIRIE NATIONAL PRESERVE is amended to acquire a portion of the ranch and maintain the tallgrass prairie. Section 1021(a) of the Omnibus Parks Act and Section 13 of the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 are amended to address recreational opportunities at federally managed manmade lakes and infrastructure financing for water-related recreation. SEC. 23. BOSTON HARBOR ISLANDS RECREATION AREA. Section 1029 of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended to clarify the relationship of the recreation area to Boston-Logan International Airport and delineate private-sector roles and responsibilities. Section 1029 of the Omnibus Parks Act is amended to clarify the relationship of the recreation area to Boston-Logan International Airport and delineate private-sector roles and responsibilities, including revenue-raising activities. SEC. 24. Natchez National Historical Park is amended to include a visitor center. SEC. 25. Regulation of fishing in certain waters of Alaska is amended. SEC. 26. National Coal Heritage Area. SEC. 26. National Coal Heritage Area is amended to further historic preservation in the region. SEC. 27. Tennessee Civil War Heritage Area. SEC. 27. Tennessee Civil War Heritage Area is amended to include sites associated with the Civil War. SEC. 28. Augusta Canal National Heritage Area is updated to reference the National Register of Historic Places. SEC. 29. Essex National Heritage Area. SEC. 29. Essex National Heritage Area is amended to correct the term "a visitors' center" to "a visitor center". SEC. 30. Ohio & Erie Canal National Heritage Corridor is updated by correcting punctuation errors. SEC. 31. Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area is amended to clarify the location of development on non-federally owned property.
